description: Ms. composite codex. Title from text 2. Leaves 258-263 detached.
abstract: Collection of Arabic and Persian texts on a variety of topics.
contents: 2. leaves 2b-4a: [al-Zubur va al-bayyināt] / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥīm al-Damāvandī.
6. leaves 15b-21a: [Ajwibat masāʼil Muhannā ibn Sinān] / Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī.
7. leaves 21b-26b: Ḥall laṭīf li-ʻibārah muʻḍilah fī Qawāʼid al-aḥkām / Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
9. leaves 27b-28b: Risālah dar bayān-i awzān-i sharʻīyah.
11. leaves 29b-32b: Risālah-i Mawlānā Rajab ʻAlī / Rajabʻalī Tabrīzī. Copy of Is̲bāt-i vājib.
13. leaves 35b-54a: [Arbaʻūn ḥadīth fī manāqib ahl al-bayt] / Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ardabīlī.
15. leaves 58a-66a: [Model marriage contracts, poetry, recipes, faʼidahs, extracts].
20. leaves 93b-97a: Fihrist al-mashyakhah ʻalá tartīb al-ḥurūf.
22. leaves 98b-121b: [S̲amarah-ʼi shajarah-ʼi ilāhīyah] / Muḥammad ibn Ḥaydar Rafīʻā.
24. leaves 123b-245a: Nukhbah wajīzah fī al-ḥikmah al-ʻamalīyah wa-al-aḥkām al-sharʻīyah / al-Fayḍ al-Kāshī.
26. leaves 249b-261b: [Mīzān al-maqādīr] / Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Taqī al-Majlisī.
extent: 263 leaves : paper ; 182 x 130 (110-150 x 66-86) mm bound to 185 x 133 mm
subject: Qurʼan. Sūrat al-Fātiḥah—Commentaries—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Full maroon leather with flap on front cover; blind-stamped fillets; yellow paper doublures; back cover missing.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
